title: Looking for an adc - High silver/Low gold
body:
Just looking for a chill dude that wants to learn to get better as an adc and can take criticism, I'm look for someone that will help me get better too

https://discord.gg/xgCXF3

Join my discord,

https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=TheWorstBard

There's my OP.GG

Feel free to add me - TheWorstBard
